law.text: Any party aggrieved by a disciplinary action of the department may bring an action in the Circuit Court of Franklin County under the provisions of KRS Chapter 13B.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 438, effective July 15, 2010. -- Created 2003 Ky. Acts ch. 119, sec. 12, effective June 24, 2003.
